title: Computerised Maintenance Management
text: Plan, monitor, & report maintenance tasks, track work orders & schedule maintenance..

data.title: Asset management
data.description: Keep records of all assets, including equipment and machinery, asset maintenance history, warranties, and purchase details.

data.title: Work order management
data.description: Create, assign, and monitor workorders to ensure tasks are completed on time. Enable recurring maintenance schedules for routine checks and preventive maintenance.

data.title: Preventive and predictive maintenance
data.description: Automate maintenance scheduling based on time or usage. Track asset conditions and alerts for upcoming maintenance or unexpected performance issues.

data.title: Cost control and budgeting
data.description: Enable maintenance budgeting, helping SMBs to forecast and control maintenance expenditures. Reports on maintenance spending over time, per asset, or by department.

data.title: Vendor and contract management
data.description: Store contact details, services offered, and contract terms. Assign work orders and track performance. Monitor and track tasks completed by external vendors for performance evaluation.

data.title: Compliance and safety
data.description: Store necessary compliance records and certificates related to equipment and safety checks. Log and review incidents or issues for safety improvement initiatives.

title: Asset performance management
text: Streamline tasks and focus on what matters with tools designed to boost your productivity.

data.title: Asset Health Monitoring
data.description: Continuously track asset health with real-time monitoring and provide instant updates on asset status. Uses sensors or condition data to detect early signs of potential failures, allowing proactive responses.

data.title: Data-Driven Predictive Maintenance
data.description: Automatically schedules maintenance based on usage, condition, or predicted failures, optimizing time and reducing unnecessary checks.

data.title: Performance KPIs and Dashboards
data.description: Track KPIs like uptime, MTTR, MTBF for quick insights into asset performance. Analyze past data to spot trends, understand recurring issues and make informed decisions.

data.title: APIs for Integrations
data.description: Rich APIs to support integrations with ERP or existing CMMS for unified data management. Supports connection with Internet of Things (IoT) sensors and SCADA systems to enhance data input and real-time monitoring.

data.title: Compliance and Security
data.description: Includes robust security features. Track changes to asset information, work orders, and other data, ensuring transparency and accountability.
